## Source: amazon-inspector (64821a4790ad9d467b84b11aa1c7038cfa1d2c7307e7db03f049a76104c15850)
The package fdir4 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2864053a37838b568ec7f045df7742f31a81c95af5bf06a5684c8b1361a213b7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'fdir4' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
